message: Yusaku: "Wow, I've really enjoyed your hospitality."
Chihiro: "Thank you for your kind words."
Yusaku: "It was quite a treat."
Chihiro: "..."
It's been an hour since he arrived.
But he's already on his third beer.
He's eaten all the celebratory food.
Shota-kun, on the other hand, hasn't eaten much.
He's acting formal in front of the Section Chief.
Yusaku: "Well then..."
Chihiro: "..."
Finally, it looks like he's about to get up.
Yusaku: "Section Chief Akizuki."
Shota: "Yes?"
Yusaku: "You left your letter of appointment on my desk, didn't you?"
Shota: "Ah..."
Shota-kun stands up, looking surprised.
He's a little flustered by the sudden development.
Shota: "I'm sorry."
Yusaku: "No need to apologize so much."
Shota: "Yes, sir."
Yusaku: "Well, you must have been so happy that you forgot about it."
Shota: "I'm truly grateful."
Chihiro: "..."
The Section Chief's brazen attitude hasn't changed.
But he's unusually gentle.
He's completely different from the first time he came here.
Is it because Shota-kun is now a Section Chief?
Maybe that's the case.
Yusaku: "Congratulations, truly."
Shota: "Thank you very much."
Yusaku: "Make sure you show the letter of appointment to your wife."
Chihiro: "No, I..."
Shota: "Here..."
He spread the paper without waiting for my response.
This was the only time Shota looked genuinely proud.
I thought it would be bad for him if I was too reluctant...
So I just glanced at the document, intending to make a mere show of it.
Chihiro: "Ah..."
It was incredible.
Shota's name written in brush script.
Just a single piece of paper, yet I felt a resonating weight in my heart.
Chihiro: "..."
That's right.
For someone being employed, the title is important.
It also gives off an aura that makes you realize this once again.
This is not just a piece of paper for Shota.
And, of course, not for me either.
Congratulations.
I want to tell him that from the bottom of my heart.
After all, his efforts have finally been rewarded.
Yusaku: "Madam, from today he is a Section Chief."
Chihiro: "I... I look forward to working with you from now on."
Yusaku: "The same goes for me."
As he nodded, Chief's gaze moved to Shota.
Yusaku: "But don't be content with this."
Shota: "Y-Yes."
Yusaku: "I want you to aim higher."
Shota: "I-I'll do my best."
Yusaku: "Did you hear his words, madam?"
Flip.
Chihiro: "!?"
Yusaku: "Aren't they reassuring words?"
Chihiro: "Ah...ah..."
My skirt was flipped up.
With his foot.
Shota: "...Chihiro."
Chihiro: "Huh...what...?"
Shota: "I'm really going to try my best."
Chihiro: "Ah..."
A tense face.
I couldn't respond to Shota's words.
While I was like that, the hem was gradually being lifted higher.
Stop it.
My underwear will be visible.
The incident with the molester suddenly flashed back in my mind.
It was the same as then.
I couldn't even let out a small scream.
What should I do?
What should I do, what should I do...
Should I grab Chief's foot?
Should I clearly say 'stop it'?
Chihiro: "..."
While maintaining my posture, I desperately stretched out only my arm.
Shota is still looking at me.
So, it's impossible to move my body exaggeratedly.
Chihiro: "(Wait a minute...)"
Stay still.
His foot was moving around inside my skirt.
The moment I tried to grab it, he evaded.
Somehow, I felt like I was being mocked by the chief.
But I also couldn't caution him with words.
Yusaku: "Aren't you going to respond to him?"
Chihiro: "...Huh?"
My mind was empty in the predicament I fell into.
Yusaku: "Section Chief Akizuki says he's going to do his best."
Chihiro: "Ah..."
Yusaku: "Or perhaps there's no need for him to work hard?"
Shota: "Is... is that so?"
Chihiro: "No, that's not it."
It's awful.
I desperately deny it.
Chihiro: "Please, stop."
Shota: "Huh?"
Yusaku: "So you're saying, it's bad if Akizuki-kun tries hard, right?"
Shota: "Is... is that so?"
Chihiro: "No, that's not what I'm talking about..."
I am desperately denying it.
Chihiro: "It...it's not about Shota."
Ugh...
Chihiro: "Ah...uh..."
No.
His toes slipped in between my knees.
Chihiro: "Ah..."
Please stop.
Now he's trying to spread my legs.
With such indecency, my whole body gets goosebumps.
I put all the strength I have in my thighs.
I won't let them open even a millimeter more.
Ugh... ugh...
Chihiro: "Uh..."
Back and forth.
Being pried open a little, then closing.
Closing, then being opened slightly again.
Yusaku: "...Akizuki-kun."
Shota: "Y...yes."
Yusaku: "There's no way your wife would say 'don't work hard', right?"
Shota: "Of course."
His gaze, seeking agreement.
Don't, Shota.
Don't involve me in the conversation.
The struggle is making my inner thighs sore.
If I let my guard down even a little, I won't be able to resist.
Yusaku: "You were surprised, right?"
Shota: "I... I was."
Ugh...ugh...ugh...
Please.
Give up already.
How long are you planning on doing this?
Ugh...
Chihiro: "Uh...ah..."
I can't anymore.
At this point, I have no choice but to scream.
I hate the self-loathing that will come later.
Yusaku: "So, shall we surprise you even more?"
Shota: "Huh?"
Yusaku: "I have a good picture, actually."
Chihiro: "Ah..."
I swallow my scream.
Without realizing it, I'm even covering my mouth.
The cell phone taken out of his breast pocket.
Yusaku is grinning.
He looks at the screen with a meaningful expression.
No...no way...
Shota: "A picture...?"
Yusaku: "I'll show you what kind of room I live in."
Chihiro: "Uh..."
Shota: "P...please, I'd love to see it."
Yusaku: "...I wonder what I should do."
Chihiro: "Uh..."
My heart feels like it's going to stop.
In addition, I realize the foolishness of letting out a scream.
"I'm not trying to spread anyone's legs."
With just that one phrase, it'll be over.
All that will remain is an awkward atmosphere.
What should be a day of celebration will be ruined.
But Yusaku is different.
I can’t deny it. The evidence is damning.
Photos of me taken in this very room.
How am I supposed to talk my way out of this lie?
Of course, I did it all for Shota.
I need to explain carefully, or he’ll misunderstand.
But to do that, I’d have to tell him everything.
And if that happens, there’s no way I can think about promotion anymore.
Everything would fall apart.
Chihiro: "Ah... no..."
Please...
Don’t show him.
Don’t tell Shota about my lies.
Yusaku: "..."
Pulls hard.
Chihiro: "Ugh..."
I have no way to fight back now.
Effortlessly, he spreads my legs apart.
What kind of position is this?
It’s way too humiliating.
I feel like my face is about to burst into flames.
Shota: "You’re not going to show me?"
Yusaku: "What should we do, ma’am?"
Chihiro: "...What?"
The pressure on my legs suddenly eases.
Yusaku: "Give me an answer."
Chihiro: "Ugh..."
I can’t close my legs.
The Section Chief’s gaze was commanding—threatening even.
It’s such a vile method, it makes me sick.
But I can’t defy him right now.
I don’t want to ruin Shota’s happiness.
Chihiro: "Maybe... next time..."
Shota: "Huh?"
Shota’s face was puzzled, as expected.
It’s no surprise.
Our conversation is so obviously unnatural.
The only one enjoying himself is the Section Chief.
He’s the absolute worst kind of person.
He’s relishing in my flustered reactions.
Yusaku: "Alright then, maybe I’ll wait until I can get an even better photo."
Shota: "Oh... um, okay..."
The phone slid back into his pocket.
But I couldn’t let out a sigh of relief.
I’m still in this shameful position.
It was better when he was holding my legs down.
Now it looks like I’m willingly sitting like this.
I look like an indecent woman.
If Shota sees me like this, he’ll definitely think so.
Just imagining it made me shiver.
This is the first time I’ve ever felt like this.
Chihiro: "..."
...No. That’s not true.
It’s not the first time.
It’s the same as after I threw away my underwear in the train station restroom.
Walking through the streets completely exposed...
I felt like everyone was staring at me.
And for some reason, I feel like that now too.
The Section Chief is deliberately talking about work.
So no one’s actually looking at me.
But why can’t I stay calm?
It’s like someone is hiding under the table, watching me.
Chihiro: "Ah..."
It’s probably just my overwhelming embarrassment.
That’s making me imagine things that aren’t real.
If this keeps up, I feel like I’ll lose my mind.
Please, let me close my legs.
This is too humiliating.
I’m just wearing loungewear—I don’t even have stockings on.
I'm only concealing my intimate parts with a single piece of underwear.
I feel like an incredibly lewd woman.
Chihiro: "Ah..."
It's past 10 o'clock.
I've been keeping my legs spread for about 15 minutes now.
But I can't just close them on my own.
Occasionally, Mr. Kazama checks in.
He stretches out my legs to check how wide they are.
Disgusting.
I glare at Mr. Kazama.
Of course, he acts as if he doesn't notice.
He continues talking to my husband.
Yusaku: "...That's what it's about."
Shota: "Ah, yes."
Yusaku: "I'm counting on you from now on."
Shota: "I, I'll do my best."
Shota, saying that, tries to pour beer.
But the bottle is empty.
Shota: "...Chihiro."
Chihiro: "Yeah, yeah."
I knew, too.
So, don't look at me like that.
I can't move freely right now.
I send a pleading gaze towards Mr. Kazama.
I'm subconsciously seeking his permission.
What am I doing?
It's just a bottle of beer.
This is Shota and my home...
Yusaku: "I'm going to call it a day."
Shota: "Is, is that so?"
Mr. Kazama, stretching leisurely...
He rattles the chair as he stands up...
